summary:
It is said that the most powerful of all the Atronach, are known as the Atriarch, masters of the elements, lords of their lesser Atronach.
It is said that they had only one master, Lorkhan, the god whose sphere represents the elements, the oldest and most powerful of all the Atronach, master of the Atriarch, and creator of Nirn.
descriptionHtml:
[size=9][i][b] [color=darkred]The Atriarch [/color][/b][/i][/size]

[size=6][color=red]
It is said that the most powerful of all the Atronach, are known as the Atriarch, masters of the elements, lords of their lesser Atronach.
It is said that they had only one master, Lorkhan, the god whose sphere represents the elements, the oldest and most powerful of all the Atronach, master of the Atriarch, and creator of Nirn.

You can make three magic staves, but to make these staves you will need the special salts dropped from the Atriarch's corpse's, and five Gold Ingots, five Firewood and five Grand Soul Gems. You can use any forge in the game to make the staves.

To find the location of the Atriarch's you will need to go behind the Guardian Stones near Riverwood, and read the book called "The Atriarch".

There are now two versions a "Overpowered" version which is the original, and a new "Nerfed" version where the staves and spells do 20% the original amount.
[/color][/size]


[youtube]qtYAd4-Z63c[/youtube]
author: Atronachades and BCSs AG
